Class StackTest (Github)

Test class for the Stacks

package calc;

import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
import org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest;
import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.MethodSource;
import java.util.stream.Stream;
    
public class StackTest {
    static final int ARRAYSTACKSIZE = 20;

    ( ... )
}

    • Method Details

      • stackImplementationProvider()

        static Stream<GenericStack<Double>> stackImplementationProvider()
        Provides ListStack and ArrayStack (with given stack size)
        
static Stream<GenericStack<Double>> stackImplementationProvider() {
    return Stream.of(
        new ListStack<Double>(),
        new ArrayStack<>(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)
    );
}

        • testPush

        public void testPush(GenericStack<Double> stack)
        Tests push Method for Stacks from @MethodSource stackImplementationProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource("stackImplementationProvider")
public void testPush(GenericStack stack) {
    for(int i = 0; i < ARRAYSTACKSIZE; i++){
        assertDoesNotThrow(() -> stack.push(0.0));
    }

    //Arraystack size exeded
    if(stack instanceof ArrayStack){
        assertThrows(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.class, () -> { stack.push(0.0); });
    }
}

        testPop

        public void testPop(GenericStack<Double> stack)
        Tests pop Method for Stacks from @MethodSource stackImplementationProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource("stackImplementationProvider")
public void testPop(GenericStack stack) {
    stack.push(0.0);
    assertEquals(0.0, stack.pop());

    assertThrows(RuntimeException.class, () -> { stack.pop(); });
}

        testPeek

        public void testPeek(GenericStack<Double> stack)
        Tests peek Method for Stacks from @MethodSource stackImplementationProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource("stackImplementationProvider")
public void testPeek(GenericStack stack) {
    assertThrows(RuntimeException.class, () -> { stack.peek(); });

    stack.push(0.0);
    assertEquals(0.0, stack.peek());
}

        testIsEmpty

        public void testIsEmpty(GenericStack<Double> stack)
        Tests isEmpty Method for Stacks from @MethodSource stackImplementationProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource("stackImplementationProvider")
public void testIsEmpty(GenericStack stack) {
    assertTrue(stack.isEmpty());
    stack.push(0.0);
    assertFalse(stack.isEmpty());
}

        testGetSize

        public void testGetSize(GenericStack<Double> stack)
        Tests getSize Method for Stacks from @MethodSource stackImplementationProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource("stackImplementationProvider")
public void testGetSize(GenericStack stack) {
    assertEquals(0,stack.getSize());
        
    stack.push(0.0);
    assertEquals(1,stack.getSize());

    stack.pop();
    assertEquals(0,stack.getSize());
}
